    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Mixing of air and bromine gas particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischen der Luft- und Bromgaspartikel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange des particules de gaz d'air et de brome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Misturar de partículas do gás do ar e do bromo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscelazione delle particelle del gas del bromo e
dell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίξη των μορίων αέρα και βρωμίου αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mezclarse de las partículas del gas del aire 
y del bromo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the mixing of moving air and bromine gas particles when the lid is removed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bromine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht das Mischen der 
beweglichen Luft- und Bromgaspartikel, wenn die Kappe gelöscht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre le mélange des particules 
mobiles de gaz d'air et de brome quand le couvercle est retiré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra misturar de partículas 
moventes do gás do ar e do bromo quando a tampa é removida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la miscelazione delle 
particelle commoventi del gas del bromo e dell'aria quando il 
coperchio è rimosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη μίξη να κινήσει τα 
μόρια αέρα και βρωμίου αέριο όταν αφαιρείται το καπάκι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra mezclarse de las 
partículas móviles del gas del aire y del bromo cuando se quita la 
tapa.</string>
          </description>
